page.title: 08Local Games (cont)
page.content:
Above that there is a square on its own with the number seven in it.They have two squares above that which have eight and nine in them.Then there is the last square which has the number ten in it.
Rules Each player is provided with a stone.Each player takes a turn throwing the stone into the first square.You have to miss out hopping onto the square which has the stone in it and get two feet into the squares two and three.You must then hop into square four with one foot and jump into five and six with both feet. Hop into seven and jump into eight and nine Hop into ten then turn and do the same all the way back,picking up the stoneon the way.They all have to take their turn to throw the stone into the
